ftb.client
Class FTB_Client_Info

java.lang.Object
  ftb.client.FTB_Client_Info

public class FTB_Client_Info
extends java.lang.Object

Contains information about a FTB client. A client should create an instance of FTB_Client_Info and use it to connect to FTB_World.

Method Detail

set_attribute

public int set_attribute(int type,
                         java.lang.String entry)
Sets an attribute of the client information.

Parameters:
type - type of information to set, i.e. one of the following four.
  • FTB_CLIENT_EVENT_SPACE
  • FTB_CLIENT_NAME
  • FTB_CLIENT_JOBID
  • FTB_CLIENT_SUBSCRIPTION_STYLE
entry - value for the information type to be set.
Returns:
status code of the operation as defined in FTB_DEF.
See Also:
FTB_DEF

get_event_space

public java.lang.String get_event_space()
Returns event space where this client belongs.

Returns:
event_space event space.

client_info

public java.lang.String client_info()

subscription_style

public java.lang.String subscription_style()
Returns subscription style of the client.

Returns:
subscription_style subscription style.
